Package cip.render.raytrace.interfaces

Interfaces for cameras, lights, backgrounds, geometries, geometry groups, materials

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRtBackground
    A background for ray tracing.
    IRtCamera
    This is the interface to a camera used in a ray-traced scene.
    IRtD
    This is the interface to the slope distribution functions used in illumination models.
    IRtG
    This is the interface to the geometric slope distribution functions used in illumination models.
    IRtGeometry
    This is the interface for geometry that can be ray-traced.
    IRtGroup
    The interface for a group.
    IRtLight
    This is the interface for lights that can be used in ray tracing or other illumination tasks.
    IRtMaterial
    The interface to a material that can participate well in a ray-traced renderer.

Package cip.render.raytrace.interfaces Description

Interfaces for cameras, lights, backgrounds, geometries, geometry groups, materials
